segments.text: Looking at this kitchen, everything seems so ordinary at first.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman by the sink, focused on her plate drying.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But then I spot the faucet blasting water out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's overflowing onto the floor in a big way.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She's unaware, foot deep in the puddle.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: To her left, the boy's climbing the stool boldly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's grabbing cookies, stool starting to tip.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's right there, hand out expectantly.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: They're in cahoots, sneaking a snack.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The open window frames a tidy garden scene.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Light pours in, highlighting the domestic vibe.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Yet hazards lurk, unnoticed by the adult.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a mix of calm and impending trouble.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Fascinating how it all contrasts so sharply.
segments.speaker: PAR
